## Tender Announcement: Laser Aiming Device with Accessories
### Invitation to Tender
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is issuing a National Individual Standing Offer (NISO) for the provision of Laser aiming devices with accessories. This tender seeks a contractor to supply these devices to the RCMP for use on operator weapon platforms.

### Tender Details

| Amendment Cycle | 3 | Modification: 3 |

### Tender Description

The RCMP is seeking a contractor to provide laser aiming devices with accessories that attach to the operator weapon platform. The device should project a laser indicating the user where their weapon is pointed. The contract duration is three (3) years from issuance, with two (2) additional extension periods of one (1) year each.

### Important Notice

*   The procurement is subject to the following Decimal Comparative Logic Charts (CLCAs):
    *   Tsawwassen First Nation Final Agreement (BC)
    *   Ta'an Kwach'an Council Final Agreement (YK)
    *   Kwanlin Dun First Nation Final Agreement (YK)
*   Basis of selection: Mandatory Technical Criteria Only

### Contact Information

*   Contracting Authority: Royal Canadian Mounted Police
*   Contact Name: Susie Dias
*   Email: <susie.dias@rcmp-grc.gc.ca>
*   Phone: (514) 258-7980
*   Address: 73 Leikin, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0R2

### Tender Delivery

Tenders must be submitted electronically to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at the aforementioned email address. Responses must be in English or French. Tender documents are available for download on the Government of Canada procurement website.

### Additional Information

The RCMP will consider only those tenderers that meet all the qualification criteria specified in the relevant format and that the solicitation documents require.
